channel.title: dances on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in dances on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LfE 8: Gifford Lectures and Indian Festivities
item.description: 23/10/2009 Greetings! I recover from a cough as I write this. The reason for the long silence is the fever I had last weekend. I know you kind-hearted people are starting to worry already!

item.title: Understanding India using Europe
item.description: It is too difficult for a European to see India as one country when they understand it’s diversity is more at the scale of a continent – their continent.
